Package io.micronaut.data.repository.jpa.reactive

Interface ReactorJpaSpecificationExecutor<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The entity type
All Superinterfaces:
ReactiveStreamsJpaSpecificationExecutor<T>
public interface ReactorJpaSpecificationExecutor<T> extends ReactiveStreamsJpaSpecificationExecutor<T>
Interface representing Reactor version of JpaSpecificationExecutor.
Since:
3.2
Author:
Denis Stepanov
